description:
8.45 apsyclip
Apply Psychoacoustic clipper to input audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: apsyclip

options.description: Set input gain. By default it is 1. Range is [0.015625 - 64].
options.name: level_in

options.description: Set output gain. By default it is 1. Range is [0.015625 - 64].
options.name: level_out

options.description: Set the clipping start value. Default value is 0dBFS or 1.
options.name: clip

options.description: Output only difference samples, useful to hear introduced distortions. By default is disabled.
options.name: diff

options.description: Set strength of adaptive distortion applied. Default value is 0.5. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
options.name: adaptive

options.description: Set number of iterations of psychoacoustic clipper. Allowed range is from 1 to 20. Default value is 10.
options.name: iterations

options.description: Auto level output signal. Default is disabled. This normalizes audio back to 0dBFS if enabled.
options.name: level
